dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT od_ob_spc_id, od_sc_region, od_pb_company, od_pb_service_location, od_pb_tech_rpt_num, od_pb_defect_sum, od_pb_defect_code, od_pb_division, od_pb_sc_dept_name, od_pb_auditor_name, od_pb_qa_engr_email, od_pb_date_opened, od_pb_contact, od_pb_contact_email, od_ob_ref_capid, od_pb_date_corr_impl, od_pb_comments, od_pb_attachment FROM q_od_ob_spc_v WHERE NVL(od_sc_region,'X') = NVL (:p_region, NVL(od_sc_region,'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_company,'X') = NVL (:p_name, NVL(od_pb_company,'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_service_location,'X') = NVL (:p_location, NVL(od_pb_service_location,'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_defect_code,'X') = NVL (:p_defect_class, NVL(od_pb_defect_code,'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_division,'X') = NVL (:p_division, NVL(od_pb_division,'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_sc_dept_name,'X') = NVL (:p_department, NVL(od_pb_sc_dept_name,'X')) And NVL(Od_Pb_Auditor_Name,'X') = Nvl (:P_Submitter, NVL(Od_Pb_Auditor_Name,'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_qa_engr_email,'X') = NVL (:p_approver, NVL(od_pb_qa_engr_email,'X')) ORDER BY od_ob_spc_id
